attributes.action: Cancel health care workers student debt
attributes.additional_details:
Health care workers have shown how essential they are. They have put themselves in harms way while many have sheltered. Many have paid the ultimate price.
We do not ask soldiers to pay for their own training so why do we ask essential health care workers.
All existing debt should be written off for current workers and for all future health care workers it should be written off after 5 years NHS service.
attributes.background:
Our NHS Health care workers have shown how essential they are. They have put themselves in harms way while many have sheltered. Many have paid the ultimate price.
Let’s clear their student debts.

rejection.details:

Reimburse nurses for student loans and fund all fees for future student nurses: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302732

Write off all student loans for all NHS staff fighting COVID19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310559

Forgive student debt of all key workers after Pandemic crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307985
